Texts.Eng:
Those unreformed chitinous-covered creatures looking like equines appear to have an ability to copycat their enemies appearance... at least they had one, as due to space-faring they had adapted to live in outskirts of Protectorate. Due to their unorthodox diet consisting of emotions they're often resorting to other dirty tricks and disguises, however.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore, can 'drain' raw flesh.

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Health x^green;1.12^reset;, Damage x^green;1.1^reset;, Fall Damage x^green;0.8^reset;
  ^yellow;Changeling Ferocity: 20% decreased energy, 25% increased energy regeneration rate.^reset;
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Darkness, Shadow Taint.
  ^cyan;Racial Ability^reset;: Changeling Stomp, Changeling Flight, Changeling Glow

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Dark: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;, -^green;10^reset;% E. Block rate, -^green;10^reset;% Hunger Drain
  Cold/Hot: Health x^red;0.95^reset;, +^red;11^reset;% E. Block Time
 ^cyan;Dark cold and dark hot planets negate both bonuses and penalties that come from them.^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  +^green;15^reset; Bioweapon mastery, +^green;10^reset; Wand mastery.

^orange;Weaknesses^reset;:
  -^red;10^reset;% Charisma, ^red;1.5^reset;x hunger rate, -^red;5^reset;% Speed & Jump height.

^orange;Resistances^reset;:
  +^green;25^reset;% Shadow, +^green;20^reset;% Poison, +^green;5^reset;%. Radiation, -^red;20^reset;% Cosmic, -^red;15^reset;% Fire and Ice.
